    • Setting up a single region model

    Set up simulated tagging dynamics

    Setup_Sim_Tagging.Rd

    Set up simulated tagging dynamics

    Setup_Sim_Tagging(
  n_sims = n_sims,
  n_yrs = n_yrs,
  n_regions = n_regions,
  n_ages = n_ages,
  n_sexes = n_sexes,
  n_tags,
  max_liberty,
  tag_years,
  t_tagging,
  base_Tag_Reporting,
  Tag_Reporting_pattern,
  Tag_Ind_Mort,
  Tag_Shed
)

    Arguments

    n_sims

    Number of simulations

    n_yrs

    Number of years

    n_regions

    Number of regions

    n_ages

    Number of ages

    n_sexes

    Number of sexes

    n_tags

    Number of tags to release in a given year

    max_liberty

    Maximum liberty to track cohorts for

    tag_years

    Years to release tags for

    t_tagging

    Time of tagging (e.g., start year == 0, mid year == 0.5)

    base_Tag_Reporting

    Base tag reporting rate by region

    Tag_Reporting_pattern

    Tag reporting pattern. Options include: constant

    Tag_Ind_Mort

    Initial tag induced mortality

    Tag_Shed

    Chronic tag shedding rate

    Contents

    Developed by Matthew Cheng.
